title: remove all chat. it causes more problems than its worth.
body:
Beneficial idea for ranked.

remove all chat: details on why:

ALL CHAT:
positive uses: saying things like "wp, gj, nice combo, nice outplay", asking things like "how did that kill me, i
Q'd you" which could be replied with "CC cant stop Vi ult,, its condiered an unstoppable movement".

kay, we have few things that could be positive here, but lets face it. these things are scarcly said.
from my almost 4 years experience in this game. they are rare statements.

**negative uses: arguing with the enemy (no all chat, cant do it)

complaining about allies (well you cant really complain about allies, to your allies., i mean you can and
people do, but they use all chat to do it, to boost their ego. they want to complain about allies, while
letting the enemy know "its not my fault").

how often do people negatively use all chat?
well in 4 years of playing this game i can say with a straight face atleast 90%
of my games, involve negative conduct being conducted in all chat.

REMOVING ALL CHAT IS REMOVING A TOOL ABUSED BY TOXIC INDIVIDUALS.
THE POSITIVES ARE HEAVILY OUTWEIGHED BY THE NEGATIVES.

IF YOURE GOING TO COMMNET WITH SOME ALONG THE LINES OF:

"dont remove it, because it doesnt hurt you if you mute it"
"dont remove it, because i use it respectuflly"
"dont remove it, because theyll find a different outlet"

DONT BOTHER. THESE ARGUEMENTS ARE ILLOGICAL.

FEW PEOPLE USING IT RESPECTFULLY DOESNT MEAN MAJORITY OF USERS DO.

MUTING IT DOESNT FIX THE PROBLEM, WHEN YOUR ALLIES ARE BUSY ARGUEING IN ALL CHAT.
TEAM GAME, ALLIES BUSY TYPING IN ALL CHAT NEGATIVELY IMPACTS YOUR GAME.
ATLEAST IN TEAM CHAT EVERYONE IS LIKELY TO MUTE THE GUY, IN ALL CHAT
THE ENEMY IS LIKELY (THIS IS FROM EXPERIENCE), TO TILT THE INDIVIDUAL CRYING FURTHER BY PICKING A SIDE
AND ADDING FIRE TO THE FLAME.

lets remove this ridiculous feature from ranked. 


-delete this again, unjustly. you know who are you.
a ticket has been opened against you-

replies.body:
My argument in the original thread still stands;

A tool should not be removed just because some people use it to break the rules, you should punish the players that use it to break the rules. All chat can (and is) used by players to make the game more enjoyable for themselves.

I find the game is much more enjoyable when I can be friendly with even my **_opponents_**. There's no sense demonizing the enemy team when they're just there to play a game as well.

If you dislike allchat, you can leave it muted and if you believe someone is taking it too far in allchat you can encourage them to do the same.

it is not some people ho abuse it, is a majority of peolpe who use it, abuse it.

all chat serves 0 benefits in ranked play.
it causes problems, and does not solve any.

>all chat serves 0 benefits in ranked play.
it causes problems, and does not solve any.

Like I said;

>All chat can (and is) used by players to make the game more enjoyable for themselves.
I find the game is much more enjoyable when I can be friendly with even my opponents. There's no sense demonizing the enemy team when they're just there to play a game as well.

Am I claiming that allchat **_isn't_** sometimes used for more negativity? No. I know that there will be people who will use any and every tool at their disposal to vent their anger at the game (and others) instead of relaxing.

But there are several aspects of the game that can (and is) used for negativity, but we're not to remove those because it's an aspect of the game.

Team chat
Emotes
post-game chat
Pinging
several abilities that can be used to troll (Anivia wall)

Some of those things have no bearing on helping you win the game either (and many times, Team chat becomes a pool of negativity that you have to mute so that you can focus on the game). The game is not just an effort to win, it's also an effort to have fun regardless of the outcome.

You're going to get a lot of people who would rather keep emotes in the game if you're going to argue that emotes should be removed from ranked as well.

Problems are not caused by the tools used to abuse others. Your argument is akin to the argument that banning guns will stop violence, which has been proven untrue (most recently in the UK many times over).

yeah all chat doesnt make people toxic. all chat just enables toxic players to tilt other toxic players further

It's called an analogy, it's intentionally not exact but it's a real world example that furthers understanding.

Also, yeah, we can stop ISIS from acquiring nukes, but how's that working? How many attacks have they carried out recently, all without nukes? Blocking one tool for toxicity does nothing but make it move to other directions such as trolling, subtle toxicity, toxicity to just your team, etc.

Another analogy: Some terrorists would love to get in the White House grounds. Does that mean the government blocks access to the White House for everyone? No, they allow it still because they know that taking away features/liberties doesn't stop bad people.
